definition[0]: used to mean a particular thing when you do not know its name or do not know exactly what it is
example[1]: Sarah said something about coming over later.
example[2]: The house was too small, so they decided to look for something else (=a different one).
example[3]: I think there’s something wrong (=a problem) with the phone.
example[4]: I don’t know what he does exactly, but I know it has something to do with computers  (=is related to them in some way).
example[5]: It’s a good car, but I’m looking for something newer.
